definition-item.definition-title: APPLYING CLOSURE MEMBERS TO BOTTLES JARS, OR SIMILAR CONTAINERS; OPENING CLOSED CONTAINERS (opening or closing devices attached to, or incorporated in, containers or container closures B65D)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Closing bottles or jars by applying:

list-item.paragraph-text: protective or decorative covers to closures;

section-body.paragraph-text: Devices for opening closed containers being hand- or power operated.
Apparatuses for applying closures and/or covers (of closures) to gas bottles.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Opening or closing test tubes in laboratory (see e.g. SA850578)
Devices for transferring samples to, in, or from, the analysis apparatus with means for piercing stoppers or septums

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Manufacturing of bottle cork safety cages or muzzles
Details related to the filling gas bottles

definition-item.definition-title: Closing bottles, jars or similar containers by applying stoppers (stoppers per se B65D39/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Feeding stoppers.
Pretreatment of stoppers.
Inserting threadless stoppers.
Inserting and rotating screw stoppers.
Securing stoppers.
Inserting disc closures.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Chemical details related to treatment of cork

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Closing containers other than bottle- or jar-type containers
Orienting and/or conveying of caps in general
Opening or closing test tubes in laboratory (see e.g. SA850578)

definition-item.definition-title: Closing bottles, jars or similar containers by applying caps (caps per se B65D41/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Pretreatment of caps.
Applying marks to caps.
Applying:

list-item.paragraph-text: Flanged caps, e.g. crown corks, by deformation of flanges;

This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Making closures, e.g. crown caps, screw caps

definition-item.definition-title: Hand- or power-operated devices for opening closed containers (nail pullers or extractors B25C11/00; attached to, or incorporated in, containers or container closures {B65D75/58, B65D77/30})

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Devices for removing:
Devices for piercing holes in closed containers
Device for cutting open closed containers operated by hand
Device for cutting open closed containers power operated
Devices for engaging elements for opening closed containers by tearing
Devices for removing barrel bungs
Combination tools for opening several different closed containers
Devices for opening closed containers by means of breaking.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices attached to, or incorporated in, containers or container closures

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Devices for breaking closed containers, see also
Devices for expelling or dispensing solid content, e.g. pills, from blister packs

section-body.paragraph-text: Groups B67B7/24 - B67B7/92 are based on IPC3.
